013package org.apache.juneau.utils;
014
015import javax.activation.*;
016
017/**
018 * An extension of {@link javax.activation.MimetypesFileTypeMap} that includes many more media types.
019 *
020 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
021 * </ul>
022 */
023public class ExtendedMimetypesFileTypeMap extends MimetypesFileTypeMap {
024
025   /**
026    * Reusable map since this object is somewhat expensive to create.
027    */
028   public static final ExtendedMimetypesFileTypeMap DEFAULT = new ExtendedMimetypesFileTypeMap();
029
030   /**
031    * Constructor.
032    */
033   public ExtendedMimetypesFileTypeMap() {
034      addMimeTypes("application/epub+zip epub");
035      addMimeTypes("application/java-archive jar");
036      addMimeTypes("application/javascript js");
037      addMimeTypes("application/json json");
038      addMimeTypes("application/msword doc");
039      addMimeTypes("application/ogg ogx");
040      addMimeTypes("application/pdf pdf");
041      addMimeTypes("application/rtf rtf");
042      addMimeTypes("application/vnd.amazon.ebook azw");
043      addMimeTypes("application/vnd.apple.installer+xml mpkg");
044      addMimeTypes("application/vnd.mozilla.xul+xml xul");
045      addMimeTypes("application/vnd.ms-excel xls");
046      addMimeTypes("application/vnd.ms-powerpoint ppt");
047      addMimeTypes("application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.presentation odp");
048      addMimeTypes("application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.spreadsheet ods");
049      addMimeTypes("application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.text odt");
050      addMimeTypes("application/vnd.visio vsd");
051      addMimeTypes("application/x-7z-compressed 7z");
052      addMimeTypes("application/x-abiword abw");
053      addMimeTypes("application/x-bzip bz");
054      addMimeTypes("application/x-bzip2 bz2");
055      addMimeTypes("application/x-csh csh");
056      addMimeTypes("application/x-rar-compressed rar");
057      addMimeTypes("application/x-sh sh");
058      addMimeTypes("application/x-shockwave-flash swf");
059      addMimeTypes("application/x-tar tar");
060      addMimeTypes("application/xhtml+xml xhtml");
061      addMimeTypes("application/xml xml");
062      addMimeTypes("application/zip zip");
063      addMimeTypes("audio/aac aac");
064      addMimeTypes("audio/midi mid midi");
065      addMimeTypes("audio/ogg oga");
066      addMimeTypes("audio/webm weba");
067      addMimeTypes("audio/x-wav wav");
068      addMimeTypes("font/ttf ttf");
069      addMimeTypes("font/woff woff");
070      addMimeTypes("font/woff2 woff2");
071      addMimeTypes("image/gif gif");
072      addMimeTypes("image/jpeg jpeg jpg");
073      addMimeTypes("image/png png");
074      addMimeTypes("image/svg+xml svg");
075      addMimeTypes("image/tiff tif tiff");
076      addMimeTypes("image/webp webp");
077      addMimeTypes("image/x-icon ico");
078      addMimeTypes("text/calendar ics");
079      addMimeTypes("text/css css");
080      addMimeTypes("text/csv csv");
081      addMimeTypes("text/html htm html");
082      addMimeTypes("text/plain txt");
083      addMimeTypes("video/3gpp 3gp");
084      addMimeTypes("video/3gpp2 3g2");
085      addMimeTypes("video/mpeg mpeg");
086      addMimeTypes("video/ogg ogv");
087      addMimeTypes("video/webm webm");
088      addMimeTypes("video/x-msvideo avi");
089   }
090}
